data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'eMail List'
define view entity zetr_ddl_i_email_list
  as select from    zetr_t_emlst                                                   as Main
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'ZETR_D_EMTIM' ) as EMailTime on  EMailTime.language  = $session.system_language
                                                                                                and EMailTime.value_low = Main.emtim

  association to parent zetr_ddl_i_company_information as _companyInformation on $projection.CompanyCode = _companyInformation.CompanyCode
{
  key Main.bukrs     as CompanyCode,
  key Main.buzei     as ListItem,
      Main.taxid     as TaxID,
      Main.emtim     as EMailTime,
      EMailTime.text as EMailTimeText,
      Main.email     as EMailAddress,
      _companyInformation // Make association public
}
